Description: Book of the Dead of Irtyru; frame 1; coloured vignettes.
Excavator/field collector: Field Collection by: Giovanni Battista Belzoni
Curator's comments: To be included in the 'Musee achemenide virtuel et interactif' (see www.achemenet.com).

Mosher, Malcom Jr. 2016. The Book of the Dead, Saite through Ptolemaic periods : a study of traditions evident in versions of texts and vignettes (SPBD Studies), vol. I (BD Spells 1-15) and II (BD Spells 16, 18-30), Charleston.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (57492) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/57492)
